content: materials - 1 2 skein s of purl soho s cattail silk 1 100% mulberry silk yarn each skein of this fingering-weight yarn is approximately 618 yards/ 100 grams approximately 618 1 236 total yards required we used the color patina blue - us 2 3 mm straight or 24-inch circular knitting needles 2 note an earlier version of this pattern used 2 skeins of purl soho s sweetgrass fine 3 no longer available for more on this version visit the original blog post 4 gauge 30 stitches and 32 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern sizes scarf wrap finished dimensions 9¼ 18½ inches wide x 72 inches long sample we knit the wrap size originally designed by purl soho designer jake canton 5 click here to see even more of jake s designs on his website 6 1 https //www purlsoho com/cattail-silk html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles--straight_needles html 3 https //www purlsoho com/sweetgrass-fine html 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/2020/04/10/botanical-lace-wrap/ 5 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/jake-canton-for-purl-soho/ 6 https //www jakecanton com/
